options.content:
### Gateway Interfaces
| Interface | Role | Network |
|-----------|------|---------|
| **igb0** (LAN) | Local network | 172.16.16.16/16 |
| **igb3** (WAN) | Internet uplink | DHCP (Charter/Spectrum) |

### Known Addresses
| Type | Address |
|------|---------|
| LAN IPv4 | `172.16.16.16` |
| WAN IPv4 | DHCP assigned |
| IPv6 prefix | `2603:8001:7402:cf1c::/64` |

### Services
Firewall (pf), NAT, DHCP Relay, NTP, Suricata IDS
